messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/10/2004 1:54:38 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
jenneferh2000@... writes:

And, like it or not, "outsiders'" decisions DO affect us all.<<<<

They surely do! Look at all the different laws in the different states!
Someone ELSE is making those decisions! And some of us have to (hah!) jump
through hoops to satisfy them.

~Kelly
